EmailTemplate.description: Send email notification to Payment owner when payment status is updated to “Complete”
EmailTemplate.name: ASI_MFM_TW_Payment_Complete_Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: MFM Payment No. {!ASI_MFM_Payment__c.Name} has been completed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!ASI_MFM_Payment__c.OwnerFullName},
Payment No.{!ASI_MFM_Payment__c.Name} has been completed. 您的付款憑單{!ASI_MFM_Payment__c.Name}已完成
Please click this link {!ASI_MFM_Payment__c.Link} to view the Payment details. 請按此 {!ASI_MFM_Payment__c.Link}連結 檢閱付款憑單明細
